I see that one of the transactions is related to a purchase at Apple Store for an iPhone, with an amount of 1000.0. This seems likely to be the transaction in question. I'll calculate the additional VAT (19.5% of 1000) and add the fee of 5.29.

The calculation will be as follows:

- VAT (19.5%): 1000 * 0.195 = 195
- Fee: 5.29
- Total Difference: 195 + 5.29 = 200.29
